entity_condition.description: If specified, only entities that fulfills this entity condition type will *_not_* see the name tag label of the entity that has the power.
entity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, only entities that fulfills this entity condition type will *_not_* see the name tag label of the entity that has the power.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, only entities which fulfills this bi-entity condition type in relation to the entity that has the power will *_not_* see the name tag label of the entity that has the power.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, only entities which fulfills this bi-entity condition type in relation to the entity that has the power will *_not_* see the name tag label of the entity that has the power.
